source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a wet city street in London at night. The rain-slicked pavement reflects the bright lights from storefronts, street lamps, and passing cars. A classic red postbox stands on the sidewalk next to the road where several London taxis are visible.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot of a wet city street in London at night. The rain-slicked pavement reflects the bright lights from storefronts, street lamps, and passing cars. A classic red postbox stands on the sidewalk next to the road where several London taxis are visible.

generated_critique: The caption incorrectly identifies the video as a scenery shot and completely omits the motion of the main human subject. The primary focus should be on the person walking. The description should be revised to state that a person holding an umbrella and a bag walks toward the camera along a wet sidewalk at night before moving out of the frame to the left. The motion of the passing cars can be mentioned as a secondary action. The details about the postbox and reflections are secondary and should be removed to focus on the subject's movement as per the instructions.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: A person holding an umbrella and a bag walks toward the camera along a wet city sidewalk at night. They continue walking until they move out of the frame to the left, while cars and London taxis pass by on the street.
